displayProperties.description: All XP gains increased by 10%.

displayProperties.name: Public Defender

displayProperties.name: Omni-Telemetry

displayProperties.name: Banshee's Favorite

displayProperties.description: Detects caches within a 50-meter range and increases Glimmer gain.
displayProperties.name: Treasure Hunter

displayProperties.description: Your vehicles take less time to summon and reload your weapons while you ride.
displayProperties.name: Speed Demon

displayProperties.description: Detects caches and resources within a 75-meter range on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: You're Welcome

displayProperties.description: Increased Glimmer and chance to obtain additional faction consumables on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Scion of Mercury

displayProperties.description: Increase Glimmer gains by 10% on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Mercury Glimmer Scavenger

displayProperties.name: Strike Glimmer Scavenger

displayProperties.description: Grants a chance to obtain additional faction consumables on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Mercury Scanner

displayProperties.description: Grants a chance to obtain additional faction consumables in Vanguard Operations.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Scanner

displayProperties.description: Exotic drops from encounters in the raids "Leviathan" and "Leviathan, Eater of Worlds" have a 50% chance of being a Year 1 Exotic not already in your collection.
displayProperties.name: Seeker of Opulence

displayProperties.description: Kills with this weapon return a fraction of the ammo used to the magazine from reserves, extending the beam's duration.
displayProperties.name: Flame Refraction

displayProperties.description: Kills with this weapon heal the wielder. Precision kills also refill the magazine.
displayProperties.name: Cruel Remedy

displayProperties.description: Multikills with this weapon immediately reload your equipped Kinetic and Energy weapons from reserves.
displayProperties.name: Harbinger's Pulse

displayProperties.description: Insectoid robot grenades quickly repopulate the magazine from reserves while the Colony is unequipped.
displayProperties.name: Serve the Colony

displayProperties.description: This weapon fires a 3-round burst.
displayProperties.name: Banned Weapon

displayProperties.description: Chain precision shots to gain bonus damage on your next body shot and return ammo to the mag.
displayProperties.name: The Fate of All Fools

displayProperties.description: Fusion projectiles attach and detonate with a delayed Void blast.
displayProperties.name: Unplanned Reprieve

displayProperties.description: This weapon's grenades are insectoid robots that chase targets and explode close to them. Consumes tougher combatants to create additional robots.
displayProperties.name: Insectoid Robot Grenades

displayProperties.description: Fires a Solar trace beam that creates a field of heat energy that grows as the weapon is fired. Sustained damage applies scorch to the target.
displayProperties.name: Prismatic Inferno

displayProperties.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.
displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram

displayProperties.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.
displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram

displayProperties.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.
displayProperties.name: Legendary Engram

displayProperties.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.
displayProperties.name: Trials Engram

displayProperties.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 2 customization optionsincluding ornaments for Exotics found in Curse of Osiris. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.
displayProperties.name: Illuminated Engram

displayProperties.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 2 customization optionsincluding ornaments for Exotics found in Curse of Osiris. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.
displayProperties.name: Illuminated Engram

displayProperties.description: An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.
displayProperties.name: Dawning Engram

displayProperties.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.
displayProperties.name: Crimson Engram

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to start off the season in style. 

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, and a stack of Mercury Vex Chrome shaders.
displayProperties.name: Limitless Starter Pack

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who watch for the rising sun. 

Contains the exclusive Star of Dark Nights Sparrow, Dawning engrams, Bright Dust, and a stack of Dawning-themed shaders.
displayProperties.name: Star of Dark Nights Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who develop lasting bonds.

Contains Crimson Engrams, Bright Dust, a weapon ornament for Graviton Lance, and a Fireteam Medallion. Available only during Crimson Days.
displayProperties.name: Unbreakable Bond Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who prefer to blend in while firing their MIDA Multi-Tool.

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, a Fireteam Medallion, and the Tactical ornament for the MIDA Multi-Tool.
displayProperties.name: Stealth Survival Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who need to get somewhere fast.

Contains an instant-summon Sparrow, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Vex Chrome shaders.
displayProperties.name: Rolling Start Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who don't mind flaunting their extravagance.

Contains the exclusive Nothing Gold jumpship, 10 Golden Trace shaders, 3 Gleaming Boons of the Vanguard, and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.
displayProperties.name: Solid Gold Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose generosity knows no bounds.

Contains 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.
displayProperties.name: Benevolence Bundle

displayProperties.description: A gift from another Guardian with whom you recently completed a strike.
displayProperties.name: Gift of Vanguard Tokens

displayProperties.description: This item serves no purpose and can be safely dismantled.
displayProperties.name: Fizzled Crucible Token Gift

displayProperties.description: A generous gift from another Guardian with whom you completed a recent activity.
displayProperties.name: Gift of Eververse Shaders

displayProperties.description: A generous gift from another Guardian with whom you completed a recent activity.
displayProperties.name: Gift of Eververse Shaders

displayProperties.description: Lost Boon Reward
displayProperties.name: Lost Boon Reward

displayProperties.description: A gift from a generous Guardian that was lost in the mail. The Postmaster deeply regrets the error.
displayProperties.name: Lost Boon Reward

displayProperties.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Armor

displayProperties.description: Ships awarded from Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Ships

displayProperties.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Emotes

displayProperties.name: Ornaments

displayProperties.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.
displayProperties.name: Shaders

displayProperties.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Ghost Shells

displayProperties.description: Transmat mods, armor mods, and weapon mods found when opening Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Mods

displayProperties.description: Sparrows awarded from Bright Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Sparrows

displayProperties.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.
displayProperties.name: Bright Dust

displayProperties.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that decreases the cooldown of one Arc, Solar, or Void subclass ability.

Abilities Affected:
Grenade
Melee
Class Ability
displayProperties.name: Ability Cooldown Armor Mods

displayProperties.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that slightly enhances a character stat.

Character Stats Affected:
Resilience
Mobility
Recovery
displayProperties.name: Character Stats Armor Mods

displayProperties.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that slightly enhances the weapon stats of an equipped Kinetic, Energy, or Power weapon. 

Weapon Stats Affected:
Handling
Stability
Reload Speed
displayProperties.name: Weapon Stats Armor Mods

displayProperties.description:
Chance to contain a weapon mod that changes the element of an Energy or Power weapon.

Weapon Elements:
Arc
Solar
Void
displayProperties.name: Elemental Weapon Mods

displayProperties.description: Exclusive armor available only during the Dawning.

displayProperties.description: Tracks the number of final bosses defeated in the Escalation Protocol.
displayProperties.name: Return TYRANT++

displayProperties.description: This mod has been deprecated. Dismantle to clear space and reclaim useful components.
displayProperties.name: Solar Ordnance Mod

displayProperties.description: This mod has been deprecated. Dismantle to clear space and reclaim useful components.
displayProperties.name: Solar Ordnance Mod

displayProperties.description: Gain a second knife per charge. Getting a final blow with a throwing knife grants consecutive knives a temporary stacking damage bonus. Gambler's Dodge refreshes the bonus timer.
displayProperties.name: Scissor Fingers

displayProperties.description: Dodging gives a small health and shield bump.
displayProperties.name: Burning Souls

displayProperties.description: Dealing melee damage reloads your currently equipped weapon. Charged melee final blows reload all weapons. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons, and movement speed and jump height after dealing melee damage.
displayProperties.name: Nightmare Fuel

displayProperties.description: Increased grenade, melee, and dodge regeneration while sprinting. Dodging increases your sprint speed.
displayProperties.name: Rapid Cooldown

displayProperties.description: Fusion Grenades gain increased throw speed, explode on impact, and stun Unstoppable Champions. Final blows with Fusion Grenades grant grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Bring the Heat

displayProperties.description: Defeating a target with melee or a finisher grants escalating melee damage, which decays over time. Higher levels of Burning Fists grant increased weapon damage.
displayProperties.name: Burning Fists

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional grenade charge. Grenade final blows spawn an Orb of Power.
displayProperties.name: And Another Thing

displayProperties.description: Arc final blows grant an escalating damage bonus with Arc weapons. Gain an overshield when activating Fists of Havoc, and gain the highest tier damage bonus to Arc weapons when your Fists of Havoc Super ends.
displayProperties.name: Resolute

displayProperties.description: While standing in any rift, gain a bonus to weapons with a damage type matching your equipped Super. Weapon final blows while standing in any rift pause the rift's countdown, extending its duration.
displayProperties.name: Blood Magic

displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows with a damage type matching your grenade grant Death Throes, which provide a grenade damage bonus and grant you grenade energy. When you have Death Throes and throw a grenade, nearby allies gain greatly increased grenade regeneration for a short time.
displayProperties.name: The Fourth Magic

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional melee charge. Powered melee final blows spawn an Orb of Power.
displayProperties.name: The Whispers
